snippet: Joseph Hayden, 71, who posts videos of Harlem officers’ activity on his Web site, claims that his arrest on weapons charges was payback.
abstract: Joseph Hayden of Harlem claims his arrest on weapons charges is payback for his years patrolling the neighborhood with his video camera, documenting interactions between the police and the residents they stop, and posting them to his Web site All Things Harlem; Hayden is fighting to have charges dropped.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Hayden, 71, who posts videos of Harlem officers’ activity on his Web site, claims that his arrest on weapons charges was payback.
